item.title: How to Register an Account with Spoon
item.description: And Troubleshooting Registering for an account on Spoon is free and open to anyone regardless of nationality. Spoon only supports English, however. Sign up, if you haven’t already. You will need to fill in your information first, then select “GET VERIFICATION CODE”, which will create your account and send a confirmation code to your stated email address. You will not be able to login to Spoon until you enter the confirmation code from the email on the registration page.
